content.body: not sure how important method ordering in the String.prototype section is, so I've added the well-formed strings methods in alphabetical order even though it splits them up and also splits up indexOf/lastIndexOf (which happened to both be adjacent and be in alphabetical order): https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/3039
shu: bakkot: let me know if you'd prefer to keep them adjacent and break alphabetical order instead
content.formatted_body: shu: bakkot: let me know if you'd prefer to keep them adjacent and break alphabetical order instead

content.body: jmdyck: you can bump ecmarkup to 16.2.0 in your PR and use the step markers now https://github.com/tc39/ecmarkup/releases/tag/v16.2.0
content.formatted_body: jmdyck: you can bump ecmarkup to 16.2.0 in your PR and use the step markers now https://github.com/tc39/ecmarkup/releases/tag/v16.2.0

content.body: but you'll bump it in main before 2952 is merged?
